result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:

Date and Time set for Preliminary Hearing.   VRCW. 

Attorney Metzman notes there was not enough time for proper notice of today's hearing and is requesting Court finds good cause to toll time limits;
State has no objection; 
Court finds good cause to toll time limits.

records.addlTxt: Atty Paige Metzman

No contact with victim(s): Pick-N-Save in Weston. Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.  Absolute sobriety from and no possession of controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed. No possession of drug paraphernalia.  Shall have his/her fingerprints and photograph taken at the Sheriff's Dept. Report to ATTIC Corrections Services (715-848-3202) within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level (4) supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.

3:23 PM 
Clerk: Amy. 
INCLUDES 22CM553, 22CF182, 22CF590.
State appears by ADA Lacey Coonen.   Defendant appears in person, with Atty Peter Vu. 

Date and time set for initial appearance in 22CM553.
**COURT quashes any outstanding warrants**
Reading Waived.  Reserve Jurisdiction. 
PLEA:  Not guilty.  

COURT ORDERS: $1000.00 signature bond.  

CONDITIONS: 
- No contact with victim(s): No contact with Pick N Save in Weston. 
- Absolute sobriety from and no possession of controlled substances except valid prescriptions taken as prescribed.  
- No possession of drug paraphernalia. 
- Prints and photograph. 
- Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release.  Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 4 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.  

JPTC:  6/24/22 at 9:45 a.m. 

COURT orders all other bonds reinstated.
